alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Paulding; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 4:33AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and patchy blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized amounts up to 4 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph tonight into Saturday morning. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute tonight. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst travel conditions from snow and blowing snow will be tonight through early Saturday afternoon. Rain will likely mix with snow for most of today which may limit impacts and accumulations before sunset.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
